NewsItem.HEADLINE: RAN 2019 Expert Insight 1 (PDF)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This report analyzes the ROI of pursuing fixed-wireless revenue with mobile technology.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: Mobile operators are competing with cable operators by adding fixed-wireless access (FWA) to their mobile networks and siphoning customers away from cable and DSL. This report analyzes the growth of demand, the level of capacity investment needed to support FWA and mobile, and the impact on revenue with combined fixed and mobile customers.
